page.title: 17BRAITHWAITES OF TEBAY
page.content: It was founded during the Second World War by Billy Woof,my Great Grandfather.It has three taxis,two trucks,two buses and two forklift trucks. The buses carry schoolchildren from Tebay,Orton,Gaisgill and Newbiggin to Kirkby Stephen Grammar School.The trucks transport all round the country and on the continent.The taxis take children to Tebay School and to a special school in Kendal.On the site we have warehouses where we have at the moment milk powder. Michael Braithwaite & Stuart Iniff
